body: Its been 7/8 hours, and i have made 3 reports. and none have been delt with. mind taking a look?

title: Check my player reports!

replies.body: #spam? Contact a staff member via skype, man!
replies.body_tagged: #spam? Contact a staff member via skype, man!

replies.body: Do not bump player reports, we will get to them eventually.
